name: Enable Healthcare FHIR Server Capability Statement
title: Dynamic FHIR Capbility Statement
description: This resource provides the conformance statement for the FHIR Server
purpose: To detail out the FHIR Specification/Conformance and guidelines for Implementers

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a patient to list allergyIntollerance for. It is a required field.

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Time period plan covers. The prefixes 'ge' and 'le' are supported for this parameter. Date may be provided once to imply a date range or twice to specify a range. When two dates are provided they must create a closed range.

searchParam.name: clinical-status
searchParam.documentation: Time period plan covers. The prefixes 'ge' and 'le' are supported for this parameter. Date may be provided once to imply a date range or twice to specify a range. When two dates are provided they must create a closed range.

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a patient to list Document Reference is for. This FHIR Server Supports only Summary purpose CCD Document(C-CDA R2.0) (Loinc Code: 48764-5)

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The _id search parameter for fetching a single DocumentReference

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: Fetches a bundle of all DocumentReference resources for the specified patient and category

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Fetches a bundle of all DocumentReference resources for the specified patient and status.

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: Fetches a bundle of all DocumentReference resources for the specified patient and type

searchParam.name: period
searchParam.documentation: Fetches a bundle of all DocumentReference resources for the specified patient and type and period

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Fetches a bundle of all DocumentReference resources for the specified patient and category and date

searchParam.name: patient

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Time period plan covers. The prefixes 'ge' and 'le' are supported for this parameter. Date may be provided once to imply a date range or twice to specify a range. When two dates are provided they must create a closed range.

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: Search by category like careteam, assess-plan

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Search by status of the Care Plan. Eg : draft | active | suspended | completed | entered-in-error | cancelled | unknown

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a patient to list care team for. It is a required field.

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Status Types like:  proposed | active | suspended | inactive | entered-in-error

searchParam.name: type

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: Search based on diagnostic report category code = ‘LAB’. This fetches a bundle of all lab related DiagnosticReport resources for the specified patient

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: The code for the report as a whole, as opposed to codes for the atomic results, which are the names on the observation resource referred to from the result
